main.title: How Korgou Perfects Your Korean Shopping
main.step_by_step_essentials_description:
Safe and comfortable shipping method!
KorGou will guide you!
main.advantage_1: Professional and dedicated delivery and purchase support services
main.advantage_3: Free package storage service for 180 days
main.advantage_4: One-stop service from purchase to overseas shipping
main.advantage_5: Value-added services that reduce total shopping costs
main.official_description: Follow our social media channels to enjoy various K-Entertainment and learn more about our services!

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.subject: Subject
contact_us.description: KorGou provides efficient customer service through its support ticket system, allowing you to easily search for knowledge-based information or submit tickets. Each request is assigned a unique ticket number for tracking and updates, and you can respond via email or log in to monitor progress and communicate with our team. Please note that inquiries received on weekends will be processed on the next business day.

calculator.calculate_description: The actual ongoing estimate may differ.

purchase_status.title: Purchase Status
purchase_status.warehouse_alert_description:
When the ordered product is delivered to the warehouse, we will send you an email. 
 
After the ordered product is delivered to the warehouse, you can set the delivery address and request delivery.

purchase_detail.title: Purchase History Details
purchase_detail.order_status_description1:
We are checking the order request. 
 
After the ordered product is delivered to the warehouse, you can set the delivery address and request delivery.
purchase_detail.order_status_description2: The ordered product has been confirmed, and the purchase is on hold.
purchase_detail.order_status_description3:
The ordered product has been confirmed, and the purchase is possible. 
Please proceed with the payment!
purchase_detail.order_cancel_request_description2: After the order is confirmed, the order request will be deleted and the order will not be processed.
purchase_detail.order_cancel_request_success_description: If the order cannot be canceled, you may receive a separate message.

review_create.title: Review Write
review_create.photo_upload_description:
Â· Images up to 5 photos under 1MB can be uploaded.
Â· If you register photos that are irrelevant or inappropriate for the product in your review, points may be withdrawn and photos may be deleted without prior warning.
review_create.review_content_placeholder: Please tell us about your experience using KORGOU.
review_create.review_policy_description:
Â· Maximum reward conditions by review grade
 Â· ex) Bronze 50 points / Silver 100 points / Gold 150 points / Diamond 200 points
 
 Â· Conditions:
   - Bronze level: 20 points for one-line review 
+ Additional max 30 points when posting with photo or video Â· Points will not be awarded for reviews/one-line reviews written before product shipment
 
Â· Even if you write multiple reviews/one-line reviews after purchasing the same product more than twice (including options), points will only be awarded once.
 Â· Reviews/one-line reviews with inappropriate content will not be approved and points will not be awarded. (Points will be retrieved if not approved within 3 months from the date of writing)

store.title: Warehouse Status
store.disposal_alert: When using the Disposal service, you can use the Photo service after requesting it.

forward_request1.alert: Do you want to request delivery for the selected product?
forward_request1.title: Delivery Request [Address Selection]
forward_request1.name: Name (English)
forward_request1.address_description: * Registered delivery address will be used for delivery.
forward_request1.delivery_method_description: * The delivery method currently selected will be applied as the default setting, and can be changed when requesting delivery.

forward_request2.title: Delivery Request [Service Selection]
forward_request2.delivery_company_description2: There is a 30kg weight limit and volumetric weight limit per BOX.
forward_request2.processing_description:
Â· Regular packaging typically takes 1-7 days from the application date, excluding weekends/holidays. With Priority processing, packaging will be completed within 48 hours from the application date, excluding weekends/holidays.
 Â· Priority processing fee - 6,000 KRW per kg 
Â· Standard processing fee - 3,000 KRW per kg
forward_request2.other_request_description: Other requests will be processed under KORGOU's judgment.

forward_request3.title: Delivery Request [Declaration Writing]
forward_request3.content_info_placeholder: 1 character or more, 15 characters or less
forward_request3.content_info_description: Please enter information about the item.
forward_request3.quantity_info_description: Please enter the quantity of the item.
forward_request3.price_info_description: Please enter the total cost of the item.
forward_request3.declaration_writing_note_description:
Â· Please enter information separately for each item.
Â· If you do not enter the relevant information, the delivery will not be processed.
Â· The price information is the total cost of the item.
Â· When writing the declaration, enter information about the item.
Â· The quantity information is the quantity of the item.
Â· The content information cannot be entered as 'product' or 'gift' etc. nameless items.

forward_request4.title: Delivery Request Content Check
forward_request4.service_cost: The service cost will be sent to you via email after the delivery request.
forward_request4.complete: Delivery request content has been confirmed.
forward_request4.complete_description2:
The selected product will be shipped out and sent to you via email!

 *The delivery status can be checked in SHIPPING>Delivery Request.
